short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No More Domains blocks all the ICANN registered domain registrars to help you stop buying so many unused domains!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buying too many domains? Use No More Domains!

No More Domains is here for developers and business owners with the previously unstoppable habit of registering too many domains too often! With No More Domains you'll find the solution as the extension blocks all ICANN registered registrars hostnames, stopping you from accessing their sites to rack up more and more on your annual domain costs.

If you want to stop spending so much money on domains every year, No More Domains is the tool for you!

Looking to get involved and add your own contributions to No More Domains? Join us in building No More Domains on GitHub at https://github.com/ImMattDavison/NoMoreDomains.

Bug fixes in this v1.0.1
- Remove unreadable files.
